meanings.sent1: The vexillologists carefully examined the different flags from around the world.
meanings.sent2: Vexillologists often attend conferences to discuss the history and design of flags.
meanings.sent3: The vexillologists joked that they could identify any country just by looking at its flag.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of flags, the vexillologists stood out like beacons of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The vexillologists' passion for flags was contagious to everyone around them.

meanings.definition: Those who have expertise in the field of vexillology.
meanings.sent1: The group of vexillologists shared their insights on flag symbolism.
meanings.sent2: Vexillologists are often consulted for their knowledge on flag history.
meanings.sent3: The vexillologists were like walking encyclopedias when it came to flags.
meanings.sent4: Among the crowd, the vexillologists' expertise shone brightly.
meanings.sent5: The vexillologists' dedication to flags was unmatched by anyone else.
